name: Phishing
description: Welcome to the Deployment Wizard!  These steps will guide you through configuring your content pack so you'll have a working use case when the wizard finishes. Make sure to follow the steps in order, you can always continue the wizard where you left off. Learn more about this packâ€™s deployment in the "Cortex XSOAR Administrator Guide" -> "Set up Your Use Case with the Deployment Wizard".

fetching_integrations.name: Microsoft Graph Mail Single User

action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the Phishing incident type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Phishing. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Microsoft Graph Mail Single User-mapper'.
action.new:
Set up new 'O365 Outlook Mail Single User' instance to start fetching Phishing incidents: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Phishing. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Microsoft Graph Mail Single User-mapper'.

fetching_integrations.description: Set up the 'O365 Outlook Mail Single User' integration to work with your Phishing use case.

action.existing:

fetching_integrations.name: MicrosoftGraphMail

action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the new Phishing type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the 'Microsoft Graph Mail Mapper'.
3. Set the Incident type field to Phishing.
action.new:
Set up new 'Microsoft Graph Mail' to work with the Phishing type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Choose the 'Microsoft Graph Mail Mapper .
3. Set the Incident type field to Phishing.

fetching_integrations.description: Set up the 'O365 Outlook Mail (Using Graph API)' integration to work with your Phishing use case.
